languages.text: {n}Монтэг рычит, опасно нависнув над вторым блюстителем, выхватившим дубинку.{/n} "Почему вы избиваете и морите жаждой моих людей как преступников? Это простые рабочие, среди них подростки и старики — они ничего не сделали!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"
languages.original_text: {n}Монтэг рычит, опасно нависнув над вторым блюстителем, выхватившим дубинку.{/n} "Почему вы избиваете и морите жаждой моих людей как преступников? Это простые рабочие, среди них подростки и старики — они ничего не сделали!"

traits.locale_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? Those are common workers: they've got youths and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? Those are common workers: they've got youths and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}Infernus Master Einrich Monteg looms over the enforcer with a menacing growl.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like criminals? Those are common workers: they've got teens and elderly among them. They did nothing wrong!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

{n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

languages.text: {n}Avec un grondement menaçant, Einrich toise le second prévôt, qui brandit sa matraque, sur la défensive.{/n} « Pourquoi malmenez-vous les miens et les privez-vous d'eau comme s'ils étaient de vulgaires criminels ? Il y a parmi eux des jeunes et des personnes âgées. Autant d'honnêtes travailleurs qui n'ont rien fait de mal ! »
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec un grondement menaçant, Einrich toise le second prévôt, qui brandit sa matraque, sur la défensive.{/n} « Pourquoi malmenez-vous les miens et les privez-vous d'eau comme s'ils étaient de vulgaires criminels ? Il y a parmi eux des jeunes et des personnes âgées. Autant d'honnêtes travailleurs qui n'ont rien fait de mal ! »

{n}Avec un grondement menaçant, le maître-infernus Einrich Monteg toise le prévôt de tout son haut.{/n} « Pourquoi malmenez-vous les miens et les privez-vous d'eau comme s'ils étaient de vulgaires criminels ? Ce sont d'honnêtes travailleurs, il y a parmi eux des jeunes et des personnes âgées sans défense. Ils n'ont rien fait de mal ! »

languages.text: {n}Con un gruñido amenazador, Einrich se coloca frente al segundo guardia, que sujeta con fuerza su porra.{/n} «¿Por qué asaltáis a mi gente y les negáis agua como si fueran criminales? Aquí hay adolescentes y ancianos; son trabajadores normales. ¡No han hecho nada malo!».
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un gruñido amenazador, Einrich se coloca frente al segundo guardia, que sujeta con fuerza su porra.{/n} «¿Por qué asaltáis a mi gente y les negáis agua como si fueran criminales? Aquí hay adolescentes y ancianos; son trabajadores normales. ¡No han hecho nada malo!».

{n}El maestro de Infernus, Einrich Monteg, se cierne sobre el agente de seguridad con un gruñido amenazador.{/n} «¿Por qué asaltáis a mi gente y les negáis agua como si fueran criminales? Son trabajadores normales, hay adolescentes y ancianos entre ellos. ¡No han hecho nada malo!».

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇咆哮着，充满了威胁的意味。他走向第二位执法者，那个执法者手里紧紧握着警棍。{/n}“你们为什么要折磨我的人，还不准他们喝水，就好像他们是罪犯一样？这些人里面有年轻人，还有老人。他们不过是普通的工人而已，什么坏事都没做过！”
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇咆哮着，充满了威胁的意味。他走向第二位执法者，那个执法者手里紧紧握着警棍。{/n}“你们为什么要折磨我的人，还不准他们喝水，就好像他们是罪犯一样？这些人里面有年轻人，还有老人。他们不过是普通的工人而已，什么坏事都没做过！”
{n}控火大师艾因里奇·蒙特格走向执法者，愤怒地咆哮着，充满了威胁的意味。{/n}“你为什么要折磨我的人，不准他们喝水，就好像他们是罪犯一样？他们只是普通工人，有孩子，还有老人。他们什么坏事都没做过！”

languages.text: {n}威嚇するようにうなり声を上げ、アインリッヒは自身のバトンを構えた2人目のエンフォーサーに迫った。{/n}「なぜ私の仲間を襲い、犯罪者であるかのように水を飲ませないのだ？ここには未成年者や年老いた者たちもいるではないか。この者たちは普通の労働者だ。何も悪いことはしていない！」
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}威嚇するようにうなり声を上げ、アインリッヒは自身のバトンを構えた2人目のエンフォーサーに迫った。{/n}「なぜ私の仲間を襲い、犯罪者であるかのように水を飲ませないのだ？ここには未成年者や年老いた者たちもいるではないか。この者たちは普通の労働者だ。何も悪いことはしていない！」
{n}インフェルヌス・マスター・アインリッヒ・モンテグは威嚇するようなうなり声でエンフォーサーに迫った。{/n}「なぜ私の仲間を襲い、犯罪者のように水を飲ませないのだ？彼らは普通の労働者だ。十代の若者や老人もいる。こいつらは何も悪いことはしていない！」

languages.text: {n}Mit einem bedrohlichen Knurren baut sich Einrich vor dem zweiten Enforcer auf, der seinen Schlagstock umfasst.{/n} "Warum attackiert Ihr meine Leute und verweigert ihnen Wasser, als wären sie Verbrecher? Ihr habt hier Jugendliche und Alte, allesamt ganz gewöhnliche Arbeiter, die sich nichts zu Schulden haben kommen lassen!"
languages.original_text: {n}With a menacing growl, Einrich looms over the second enforcer, who is holding his baton at the ready.{/n} "Why are you assaulting my people and denying them water like they're criminals? You've got teenagers and elderly folk here — they're all just ordinary workers, they've done nothing wrong!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem bedrohlichen Knurren baut sich Einrich vor dem zweiten Enforcer auf, der seinen Schlagstock umfasst.{/n} "Warum attackiert Ihr meine Leute und verweigert ihnen Wasser, als wären sie Verbrecher? Ihr habt hier Jugendliche und Alte, allesamt ganz gewöhnliche Arbeiter, die sich nichts zu Schulden haben kommen lassen!"

{n}Infernus-Meister Einrich Monteg richtet sich bedrohlich knurrend vor dem Enforcer auf.{/n} "Warum attackiert Ihr meine Leute und verweigert ihnen Wasser, als seien sie Verbrecher? Das sind einfache Arbeiter, es sind Jugendliche und Alte darunter. Sie haben nichts getan!"
